name: 2nd Puberty
description:
2nd Puberty is a 2D pixel game that illustrates the struggles of gender dysphoria. It tells the story of an FTM character in a society that reinforces traditional gender roles. The game incorporates common battle mechanics to depict the negative/stunting impact of dysphoria, hindering the player's ability to play the game. Controls
  • For BGM, please click on the game.
  • Arrow keys for movement & selection.
  • Z = Select
  • X = Back
  • Enter = Menu (new feature)
